Package gg.w6.chesslib.util

package gg.w6.chesslib.util
  • Class
    Description
    FenParser
    This class is a static utility class for parsing FEN strings.
    MoveGenerator
    This class is a static utility class for generating and getting the legal moves of a position.
    Moves
    This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return Moves.
    PgnDatabaseSplitter
    An Iterator and Iterable for reading individual games from a PGN (Portable Game Notation) file.
    PgnParser
    This class is a static utility class for parsing PGN strings representing a single game of Chess.
    Pieces
    This class consists of a single static member, Pieces.PROMOTION_CANDIDATES.
    PositionBuilder
    A mutable builder class for constructing Position instances programmatically.
    Positions
    A utility class providing static methods for analyzing chess Position states.
    PositionValidator
    Provides utilities for validating the legality of a given chess Position.
    PositionValidator.Legality
    An enum representing the various outcomes of a legality test of a Position
    SanParser
    A utility class for parsing Standard Algebraic Notation (SAN) strings into Move objects.
